The accompanying [R Notebook](http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com/r_notebooks.html) is a simple example that combines [R code chunks](http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com/authoring_rcodechunks.html), [Python](https://www.python.org) [code chunks](http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com/authoring_knitr_engines.html), and [BibTeX](http://www.bibtex.org) literature citations in one [R Markdown](http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com) document.

For additional information please see [RStudio as a Research and Writing Platform](/post/rstudio-as-a-research-and-writing-platform/).

Click [here](/rnotebooks/basemap.nb.html) to read the notebook.
